'''Dr. Shagrin''' is the family physician of Liam Collins, who came to the hospital after a tour bus crash.

==History==
When one of his patients, Liam Collins, was in an accident and had been mixed up with another patient, Dr. Shagrin was called the hospital to look over his test results. When he arrived, [[Simone Griffith]] took him to the viewing room, where [[Amelia Shepherd|Amelia]] went over all his results. At the end, Dr. Shagrin told [[Jane Collins]], Liam's mom, that he agreed with the doctors' assessment that he was brain dead.

==Career==
He is a family medicine practitioner.
